title: TOP TEN TRACTOR ATTACHMENTS VOTED BY REAL TRACTOR OWNERS

tasks.task: Generate a list of tasks related to tractor attachments based on survey results.
subtasks: Identify top 10 tractor attachments as per survey.
List tasks related to tiller usage for ground preparation.
Explain benefits of hydraulic top links for quick attachment changes.
Discuss importance of ballast for front-end loader stability.
Describe backhoe attachment use in various applications.
Mention stump buckets and standard buckets for material handling.
Highlight quick hitch as an attachment-saving accessory.
Emphasize front-end loader as a versatile attachment.
Detail the importance of cutter mowers for maintaining fields.
Explain the use of grapples for material pickup and handling.
Describe box blades and land planes for surface leveling.
Highlight pallet forks as the most versatile and frequently used attachment.
